sqlMap.sql: select u.TRAIN_REQ_ID, u.TRAIN_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.TRAIN_COURSE_NO, u.TRAIN_COURSE_NAME, u.TRAIN_TYPE, to_char(u.TRAIN_TIME_BEG,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_TIME_BEG, to_char(u.TRAIN_TIME_END,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_TIME_END, u.TRAIN_ADDR, u.FIXED_PSON_NUM, u.REQ_JOIN_NUM, u.REQ_REASON, u.TRAIN_COURSE_ID, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_TRAIN_REQ u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_TRAIN_REQ u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_TRAIN_REQ( TRAIN_REQ_ID, TRAIN_REQ_NO, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, TRAIN_COURSE_NO, TRAIN_COURSE_NAME, TRAIN_TYPE, TRAIN_TIME_BEG, TRAIN_TIME_END, TRAIN_ADDR, FIXED_PSON_NUM, REQ_JOIN_NUM, REQ_REASON, TRAIN_COURSE_ID, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #TRAIN_REQ_ID#, #TRAIN_REQ_NO#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #TRAIN_COURSE_NO#, #TRAIN_COURSE_NAME#, #TRAIN_TYPE#, to_date(#TRAIN_TIME_BEG#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#TRAIN_TIME_END#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #TRAIN_ADDR#, #FIXED_PSON_NUM#, #REQ_JOIN_NUM#, #REQ_REASON#, #TRAIN_COURSE_ID#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_TRAIN_REQ
CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME# TRAIN_COURSE_NO = #TRAIN_COURSE_NO# TRAIN_COURSE_NAME = #TRAIN_COURSE_NAME# TRAIN_TYPE = #TRAIN_TYPE# TRAIN_TIME_BEG = to_date(#TRAIN_TIME_BEG#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_TIME_END = to_date(#TRAIN_TIME_END#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_ADDR = #TRAIN_ADDR# REQ_JOIN_NUM = #REQ_JOIN_NUM# FIXED_PSON_NUM = #FIXED_PSON_NUM# REQ_REASON = #REQ_REASON# TRAIN_COURSE_ID = #TRAIN_COURSE_ID# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where TRAIN_REQ_ID = #TRAIN_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_TRAIN_REQ set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where TRAIN_REQ_ID = #TRAIN_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.TRAIN_REQ_ID, u.TRAIN_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.TRAIN_COURSE_NO, u.TRAIN_COURSE_NAME, u.TRAIN_TYPE, to_char(u.TRAIN_TIME_BEG,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_TIME_BEG, to_char(u.TRAIN_TIME_END,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI') TRAIN_TIME_END, u.TRAIN_ADDR, u.FIXED_PSON_NUM, u.REQ_JOIN_NUM, u.REQ_REASON, u.TRAIN_COURSE_ID, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_TRAIN_REQ u where u.TRAIN_REQ_ID = #TRAIN_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID, u.TRAIN_REQ_ID, u.TRAIN_TYPE, u.TRAIN_OBJECT_ID, u.TRAIN_OBJECT_NO, u.TRAIN_OBJECT_NAME, u.REMARK, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_TRAIN_REQ_DTL u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_TRAIN_REQ_DTL( TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID, TRAIN_REQ_ID, TRAIN_TYPE, TRAIN_OBJECT_ID, TRAIN_OBJECT_NO, TRAIN_OBJECT_NAME, REMARK, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID#, #TRAIN_REQ_ID#, #TRAIN_TYPE#, #TRAIN_OBJECT_ID#, #TRAIN_OBJECT_NO#, #TRAIN_OBJECT_NAME#, #REMARK#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_TRAIN_REQ_DTL
TRAIN_TYPE = #TRAIN_TYPE# TRAIN_OBJECT_ID = #TRAIN_OBJECT_ID# TRAIN_OBJECT_NO = #TRAIN_OBJECT_NO# TRAIN_OBJECT_NAME = #TRAIN_OBJECT_NAME# REMARK = #REMARK# STATE = #STATE#
where TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID = #TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_TRAIN_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where TRAIN_REQ_DTL_ID in ($TRAIN_REQ_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_TRAIN_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where TRAIN_REQ_ID = #TRAIN_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql: select u.TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID, u.TRAIN_REQ_ID, u.TRAIN_PER_NO, u.TRAIN_PER_NAME, u.THE_ORGAN, u.THE_POST, u.SIGN_STATE, u.TRAIN_PER, u.TRAIN_ASSES, u.TRAIN_OVERALL, u.REMARK, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_TRAIN_RESULT_DTL u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_TRAIN_RESULT_DTL( TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID, TRAIN_REQ_ID, TRAIN_PER_NO, TRAIN_PER_NAME, THE_ORGAN, THE_POST, SIGN_STATE, TRAIN_PER, TRAIN_ASSES, TRAIN_OVERALL, REMARK, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID#, #TRAIN_REQ_ID#, #TRAIN_PER_NO#, #TRAIN_PER_NAME#, #THE_ORGAN#, #THE_POST#, #SIGN_STATE#, #TRAIN_PER#, #TRAIN_ASSES#, #TRAIN_OVERALL#, #REMARK#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_TRAIN_RESULT_DTL
TRAIN_PER_NO = #TRAIN_PER_NO# TRAIN_PER_NAME = #TRAIN_PER_NAME# THE_ORGAN = #THE_ORGAN# SIGN_STATE = #SIGN_STATE# TRAIN_PER = #TRAIN_PER# TRAIN_ASSES = #TRAIN_ASSES# TRAIN_OVERALL = #TRAIN_OVERALL# STATE = #STATE# REMARK = #REMARK#
where TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID = #TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_TRAIN_RESULT_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_ID in ($TRAIN_RESULT_DTL_IDS$)
